programme.desc: Weather-ready woods create pure wilderness relaxation in this Adirondack camp chair.

programme.title: J. Schwanke's Life in Bloom
programme.desc: J Schwanke visits Crane Dance Farms and learns the value of pasture-raised food.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati meets the young chefs and owners of one of Guadalajara's most exciting new restaurants, Xokol, where they are reconnecting with their roots and using heritage corn to create a menu full of delicious dishes.

programme.title: Cook's Country From America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: The 'America's Test Kitchen' team presents recipes featured in 'Cook's Country' magazine.

programme.title: Lidia's Kitchen
programme.desc: Lidia Bastianich conjures simple, seasonal and economical dishes with love.

programme.title: Maria's Portuguese Table
programme.desc: Maria goes to California's Bay to visit some of the top young chefs in the area (who happen to be Portuguese). Then, a tour around San Jose's 'Little Portugal' and the Avaya Soccer Stadium with Taylor Amarante.

programme.title: Simply Ming
programme.desc: Buffalo chicken wings and vegetable tempura are accompanied by a classic shandy.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen From Cook's Illustrated
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison cooks Murgh Makhani (Indian Butter Chicken), ingredient expert Jack Bishop gives a primer on tomato products, and test cook Becky Hays makes Palak Dal (Spinach Dal with Cumin and Mustard Seeds).

programme.title: Kevin Belton's Cookin' Louisiana
programme.desc: Kevin prepares chicken fried steak, Cornish game hen with carrot souffle and chess pie.

programme.title: My Greek Table With Diane Kochilas
programme.desc: Diane visits Nemea and Argos where she learns with a village cook how to make a local pasta dish and a cheesy skillet pie. In the kitchen, she makes a sautéed spinach and orange recipe, tender braised pork with cabbage, and cookies made with olive oil.

programme.title: Sara's Weeknight Meals
programme.desc: Great recipes include Korean barbecue tacos, spaghetti squash with a creamy goat cheese sauce and dried fruit potstickers.

programme.title: Wine First
programme.desc: The Rheingau wine-region of Germany is famous for both red and white wines. Liora and Yolanda are determined to taste as many wines as possible, to find the perfect selection for the chef's challenge. Three wineries are on their list.

programme.title: Christopher Kimball's Milk Street
programme.desc: Milk Street is a multimedia, instructional food preparation organization.

programme.title: This Old House
programme.desc: Kevin helps Tom to adjust where the old house is out of level with new addition. Then he meets Mark to look at stone veneer. Charlie needs to raise the rafters on the back dormer for more headroom. Kevin and the homeowner and designer look at tile.

programme.title: Ask This Old House
programme.desc: Ross discusses the pros and cons of smart doorbells; Mauro demonstrates techniques for painting wood paneling; Heath shares some of his most-used tools and helps a homeowner install recessed lights.

programme.title: The Lawrence Welk Show
programme.desc: The Lawrence Welk Band gets things underway for this Halloween party with 'That Old Black Magic.' Arthur Duncan rattles those 'Dry Bones.' Guy and Ralna sing 'Old Devil Moon.' Other Halloween themed songs include 'Ghost Riders' and 'Magic Moonlight.'

programme.title: Frankie Drake Mysteries
programme.desc: Frankie and team must outcon a conman who's stolen money from Nora and Mildred.

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc: Father Brown investigates a murder at an outdoor Jester Festival.

programme.title: Shakespeare and Hathaway: Private Investigators
programme.desc: An oddball couple of private detectives named Luella and Frank investigate crime.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: The murder of a local gigolo brings DI Goodman and his team into contact with the social elite of Saint-Marie.

programme.title: Austin City Limits
programme.desc: Delight in the throwback country music of Brandy Clark and Charley Crockett. Nashville-based hit songwriter Clark performs cuts from her highly acclaimed Your Life is a Record. Lone Star native Crockett plays tunes from his album Music City U.S.A.

programme.title: Bluegrass Underground
programme.desc: Music performances from the Volcano Room, 333 ft. underground in the Cumberland Caverns.

programme.title: A Chef's Life
programme.desc: Vivian discusses why she employs a home cook to test her recipes from her cookbooks.

programme.title: Nova
programme.desc: A documentary series that invites viewers to come along for a scientific adventure.

programme.title: Nature
programme.desc: Follow the struggles, failures and triumphs of a single osprey family. Ospreys are unique among raptors for their ability to hunt live fish and dive into water.

programme.title: Secrets of the Dead
programme.desc: Incredible scientific investigations from across the globe are helping piece together the untold story of prehistoric women. The latest research separates fact from fiction and sheds new light on our ancient foremothers.

programme.title: American Veteran
programme.desc: As recruits take the oath to serve, they leave the civilian world to become a soldier, sailor, marine, airman or woman. This is the start of their transformation.

programme.title: Washington Week
programme.desc: The panel will discuss the challenges the president faces getting agreement within his party on paying for the bipartisan infrastructure bill and whether he can get progressives and moderates on board with plans.

programme.title: Firing Line With Margaret Hoover
programme.desc: Sen. Bob Menendez, D-NJ, discusses his immigration reform plan and protecting Americans against floods. The Senate Foreign Relations Committee chair outlines how the U.S. should promote democracy in Cuba, support Taiwan and prevent a nuclear Iran.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers introduces a series of programs about nighttime, and shows a tape of a flashlight factory.

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Buster's Uncle Bob tells him a spooky bedtime story about an encounter with a mysterious creature called the lycanbunny. Cheikh is worried that if he and his family become American citizens, then they will have to abandon their Senegalese culture.

programme.title: Arthur and the Haunted Tree House
programme.desc: While trick-or-treating, Francine meets an elderly woman with a very mysterious past, while Binky finds himself at Mr. Ratburn's amazing haunted house. And, Arthur, Buster, and Ladonna's tree house sleepover seems to be haunted!

programme.title: Wild Kratts
programme.desc: The Wild Kratts aren't too sure what to do for Halloween. Martin and Chris don't realize that Zach and the other villains have come up with a plan to ruin Halloween.

programme.title: Curious George: A Halloween Boo Fest
programme.desc: George is excited to spend his first Halloween in the country. When Bill tells George and Allie a spooky tale about a scarecrow that haunts the countryside, the two pals set out to get a photo of the fearsome creature.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About Halloween!
programme.desc: The Cat in the Hat takes Nick and Sally on the craziest Halloween ride filled with howlers and shockers and scary fandangles, big laughs and music and fun from all angles.

programme.title: To the Contrary
programme.desc: Examines major issues with women of various ethnic and political backgrounds.

programme.title: The Chavis Chronicles
programme.desc: Dr. Chavis goes beyond the headlines offering insights on matters that impact the public.

programme.title: Carolina Business Review
programme.desc: Haley Gentry, Elliott Summey and Michael Landguth visit.

programme.title: Consuelo Mack WealthTrack
programme.desc: A weekly series that provides an original holistic approach to investing.

programme.title: Palmetto Scene
programme.desc: Features Southern filmmakers who take on ghosts of Southern plantations, the work of a professional movie makeup artist, and an exploration of the world of Cosplay in South Carolina.

programme.title: This Week in South Carolina
programme.desc: This Week in South Carolina highlights one topic each week with newsmakers.

programme.title: Nova
programme.desc: A documentary series that invites viewers to come along for a scientific adventure.

programme.title: Man in the Arena
programme.desc: The story of the life and influence of Roger Ailes, a controversial media icon and political strategist.

programme.title: Messiah
programme.desc: With the death and resurrection of Jesus, the disciples develop an unshakeable faith and the Kingdom of God is born. His plan is revealed and Jesus ascends to Heaven to mount his throne.
